attributes.action: Stop the war on motorists and free up our roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government's Transport Policy of creating speed humps, mini roundabouts and chicanes to force the motorist out of his car and on to public transport has had a most damaging effect on the economy.
Measures taken against the motorist have also affected businesses taking us from the fourth most competitive nation to the thirteenth.
No regard has been given to Government research that shows that a single bus pollutes the atmosphere more than 128 cars.
